name: Galaxy Ranger
description:
The game:

Try to save the galaxy in this retro arcade side-scrolling space shooter. Don't be frustrated, but it is hard to survive. Find all the bonuses to power up your ship and fight the epic boss. So far just one level, but more coming soon.

Keyboard controls:

  • The arrow keys to move the ships
  • Shoot with SPACE

Game controller controls:

  • Move the ships with the Left Stick
  • Shoot with (A)

The game was written in RCBASIC. Great modern BASIC for creating 2D games for Windows, Linux, Android and Mac.
